text:
Hi everyone, I wanted to ask you guys a question to get an answer to a question I had.
I want to use cms/v3/site-search/search to get custom_module data, which is response data from cms/v3/blogs/posts.
I want to get data from a custom module I defined in the search
API.Please see the picture referenced, help me please!

:wave: Hello! Usually when sending emails to customers theyâ€™re recorded on the deal or company record. We use a custom object called a website, so the emails are not recording properly. Is it possible to record emails to the website object, and is there anyone who can help make it happen? Thanks!

Hello Everyone, i hope everything is doing great!. I got in to a situation with HubSpot api call. If a user uninstall or disconnect integration from third party app side, it still have installed app in HubSpot and user continues to have calling or other services from HubSpot. Is there a way to send a flag to notify the disconnected/uninstall message from application end so that we can make necessary changes in HubSpot user account.

Error on <http://api.hubapi.com/contacts/v1/contact|api.hubapi.com/contacts/v1/contact>

Anyone else having a problem?

Hi All -

I am excited to announce that this morning we have released additional endpoints as part of Lists API v3 to create, update, delete, and fetch lists.

The new endpoints have been added to the API documentation <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/lists|here>. Additionally, you can learn more about the definition of a list and its filters at the newly published docs <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/lists-filters|here> and <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/list-filters-definitions|here>.

As a quick note, because lists is currently undergoing a change to its time filter format, all time-based filters have been disabled for create/update as part of this initial release of List CRUD operations.

Please join us over at <#C05T36XTUBF|lists-api-v3> for any questions or comments you have regarding this API. Thanks!

Hello all, does anyone know if there a historical record of down times on HubSpot APIs? Trying to cross-reference a time we saw some downtimes with a external IPaaS to see if they match with HS internal ones/ cloudflare.
yep got a few HTTP 500s shortly after your message on the v3/contacts API as well.
